A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 2/10. Amazing special effects\, the first and last scenes are amazing. However\, in the middle\, the moronic subplots\, characters that you can't bring yourself to care about\, and the childish jokes that kill all notions of tension. I could go longer about promblems with this thing\, but I don't wan't to spoil it for those that still care.
